sections.title: Critical Fixes
items: FIXED: Crit chance never worked (was always 0%)
FIXED: Crit damage upgrades now actually apply
All crit-based builds now functional

sections.title: Visual Improvements
items: Thorns damage now shows magenta with THORNS! label
Crit hits show orange glow and larger bullets
Better visual feedback for all damage types

sections.title: Balance
items: Multi Shot: +1 ‚Üí +2 projectiles (now Rare)
Multi Shot now worth picking over weapon-specific

sections.title: New Weapons
items: Laser Beam (Lv20): Continuous damage beam with rapid fire
Shotgun Blaster (Lv25): 8-pellet spread for close-range devastation
Tesla Coil (Lv30): Chain lightning arcing between enemies

sections.title: System Improvements
items: Weapon unlocks now config-based (easier to add new weapons)
7 total weapons (up from 4)
Weapons unlock at levels: 1, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30
Better late-game progression and variety

sections.title: Visual Effects
items: New chain lightning effect with energy nodes
Improved beam rendering for laser weapons
Enhanced weapon variety and visual feedback

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed damage reduction/crit caps allowing invincibility
Fixed explosion visual not matching damage area
Thorns now actually reflects damage to attackers

sections.title: Balance
items: Faster progression: XP scaling reduced 1.5x ‚Üí 1.2x
Faster waves: Delay reduced 2.0s ‚Üí 1.0s
Railgun buffed: 2.5x ‚Üí 4.0x damage
Bomb nerfed: 400px ‚Üí 350px radius, boss damage 25% ‚Üí 15%

sections.title: New Caps
items: Crit chance: 75% max
Crit damage: 5x max
Damage reduction: 80% max
Orbital drones: 10 max (performance)
